smallDeal.heading: House for Sale - 2BR/1BA
smallDeal.description: Low down payment to pick up this 2/1 house. Owner/seller unexpectedly moving out of town. Right person will do well.
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: House for Sale - 3BR/1BA
smallDeal.description: Low down payment to pick up this 3/1 house. Owner/seller unexpectedly moving out of town. Right person will do well.
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: Sister-In-Law borrows Money
smallDeal.description: Sister-in-law is downsized.Needs $5000 to make house payment. She promises to pay you back $10000 after she finds a new job.If you choose to help, pay $5000 and roll die again
smallDeal.rule: Die = 1-3, She never pays you back and you lost $5000 --- Die = 4-6, She pays you back $10000, but family get-togethers are still awkward

smallDeal.heading: Stock - OK4U Drug Co.
smallDeal.description: Interest rates cripple share price of this long time maker of medicines.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price.Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.heading: Multi-Level Marketing Buy-in
smallDeal.description: Company is looking to spread the reach of the newest venture.
smallDeal.rule: If you choose to buy in pay $500. Every payday roll 1 die. Die=1-3, No returns. Die=4-6, Collect $500

bigDeal.heading: 4-Plex for sale
bigDeal.description: Nice, well-maintained 4-Plex in good neighbourhood. Stable tenants, positive cash flow, minor repairs.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: 4-Plex for sale
bigDeal.description: Nice, well-maintained 4-Plex in good neighbourhood. Stable tenants, positive cash flow, minor repairs.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

market.heading: Sewer Line Breaks
market.description: Water is everywhere at your property!.
market.rule: Pay $2000 for a new sewer line(one time). Take out a bank loan if necessary
subRule: Card applies only to person who drew it
If you own No real estate. Ignore the card

market.heading: Stock - OK4U Drug Co.
market.description: OK4U begins trail on possible life saving drug. Side effects are untested. Could change the world... if it works.
market.rule: Cardholder rolls 1 die. Die=1-3,Double. Die=4-6,Half the stocks.

market.heading: Plex Buyer
market.description: Buyer offers $25,000 per unit for all units in any combination of duplexes, 4-plexes, or 8-plexes. Has own financing.

market.heading: Plex Buyer
market.description: Buyer offers $25,000 per unit for all units in any combination of duplexes, 4-plexes, or 8-plexes. Has own financing.

market.heading: Tenant Damages Your Property
market.description: Tenant refuses to pay rent after the tenant has been evicted, you discover significant damage to your property
market.rule: Pay $500 for the repairs. Take out a bank loan if necessary
subRule: Card applies only to person who drew it
If you own No real estate. Ignore the card

charity.heading: charity
charity.description: Donate 10% of your total income and use 1 or 2 dice for next 3 turns

downsized.heading: downsized
downsized.description: Pay the amount of your total expenses to the bank and lose 2 turns

baby.heading: New Baby
baby.description: Congratulations! Your family has a new arrival
